sourcesContent:
"use client" import { useState, useEffect } from "react" import { Container, Row, Col, Button, Card } from "react-bootstrap" import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom" import { motion } from "framer-motion" const LandingPage = () => { const navigate = useNavigate() const [currentFeature, setCurrentFeature] = useState(0) const features = [ { icon: "🎓", title: "Smart Learning", description: "Access courses, assignments, and resources in one place", }, { icon: "📊", title: "Progress Tracking", description: "Monitor your academic progress with detailed analytics", }, { icon: "🤝", title: "Campus Community", description: "Connect with peers, faculty, and participate in events", }, { icon: "🎯", title: "Career Support", description: "Get placement assistance and career guidance", }, ] const stats = [ { number: "10K+", label: "Students", icon: "👥" }, { number: "500+", label: "Courses", icon: "📚" }, { number: "100+", label: "Faculty", icon: "👨‍🏫" }, { number: "95%", label: "Success Rate", icon: "🏆" }, ] useEffect(() => { const interval = setInterval(() => { setCurrentFeature((prev) => (prev + 1) % features.length) }, 3000) return () => clearInterval(interval) }, [features.length]) return (
{/* Hero Section */} {/* Floating Elements */}
🎓
📚
🏆
🎯
🚀 Welcome to the Future of Education

Smart Campus Portal

Your gateway to academic excellence. Manage courses, track progress, connect with peers, and achieve your educational goals.

{/* Features Section */}

Why Choose Smart Campus?

Discover the features that make learning extraordinary

 {features.map((feature, index) => (
{feature.icon}

{feature.title}

{feature.description}

 ))} {/* Stats Section */} {stats.map((stat, index) => (
{stat.icon}

{stat.number}

{stat.label}

 ))} {/* CTA Section */}

Ready to Transform Your Education?

Join thousands of students and faculty members who are already experiencing the future of education.

) } export default LandingPage
